data.title: Merit Award
data.text:
Winners may order duplicate copies of the Gold Quill Award of Merit. The trophy includes a bronze nameplate engraved with the following information:

*The year of your award

The name(s) for the award (editable)

*Your organization name

*Entry title

*Entry Category

Please allow 3-4 weeks for delivery.

Price is $219 plus shipping

After you have selected your award, please review the copy below for accuracy. Please note that your award copy will be professionally typeset and formatted, approval is for content only.
